sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import clsx from 'clsx';
import { Component } from "react";
import PropTypes from 'prop-types';
import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/styles';
import {
  Card,
  CardHeader,
  CardContent,
  CardActions,
  Divider,
  Grid,
  Button,
  TextField
} from '@material-ui/core';
class AccountDetails extends Component{



  
   getUserDetails= _ =>{
    const userNamesession = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'));
    console.log(userNamesession)
        fetch('http://localhost:4000/api/user/listByUsername/'+userNamesession.username )
        .then(response=>response.json())
        .then(response=>this.setState({data:response.data}))
        .catch(err=>console.error(err))
      }
 

  

      render(){
        {this.state.data.map(function (user) {
        return ( 
          <React.Fragment>
    <Card
       
       
    >
      <form
        autoComplete="off"
        noValidate
      >
        <CardHeader
          subheader="The information can be edited"
          title="Profile"
        />
        <Divider />
        <CardContent>
          <Grid
            container
            spacing={3}
          >
            <Grid
              item
              md={6}
              xs={12}
            >
              <TextField
                fullWidth
                helperText="Please specify the first name"
                label="First name"
                margin="dense"
                name="firstName"
                 
                required
                value={""}
                variant="outlined"
              />
            </Grid>
            <Grid
              item
              md={6}
              xs={12}
            >
              <TextField
                fullWidth
                label="Last name"
                margin="dense"
                name="lastName"
                
                required
                value={""}
                variant="outlined"
              />
            </Grid>
            <Grid
              item
              md={6}
              xs={12}
            >
              <TextField
                fullWidth
                label="Email Address"
                margin="dense"
                name="email"
                 
                required
                value={""}
                variant="outlined"
              />
            </Grid>
            <Grid
              item
              md={6}
              xs={12}
            >
              <TextField
                fullWidth
                label="Phone Number"
                margin="dense"
                name="phone"
                
                type="number"
                value={""}
                variant="outlined"
              />
            </Grid>
            <Grid
              item
              md={6}
              xs={12}
            >
              <TextField
                fullWidth
                label="Select State"
                margin="dense"
                name="state"
                 
                required
               
                // eslint-disable-next-line react/jsx-sort-props
                
                value={""}
                variant="outlined"
              >
                 
              </TextField>
            </Grid>
            <Grid
              item
              md={6}
              xs={12}
            >
              <TextField
                fullWidth
                label="Country"
                margin="dense"
                name="country"
                 
                required
                value={""}
                variant="outlined"
              />
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </CardContent>
        <Divider />
        <CardActions>
          <Button
            color="primary"
            variant="contained"
          >
            Save details
          </Button>
        </CardActions>
      </form>
    </Card>
    </React.Fragment>
        )

      })
      
    }
      }}


export default AccountDetails;
